installations.title: Neural Resonance
installations.description: An immersive installation where visitors' brain waves create real-time visual and audio experiences. EEG sensors capture neural activity, transforming thoughts and emotions into evolving digital landscapes and soundscapes.

installations.title: P.E.R.S.O.N.A.
installations.description: An AI entity that learns to communicate with humans through facial expressions and proximity sensors. This participatory experience explores empathy between humans and artificial intelligence through reinforcement learning.

installations.title: Amuleto - Sincere Pill Dispenser
installations.description: A sincere and courageous pill dispenser designed to help patients cope with their diagnosis. The project emerged from a Multisensory Design process that included multiple human senses in product design.

installations.title: Exhibition of a Lifetime
installations.description: A VR art gallery where spectators journey through visual and audio experiences representing four phases of life: childhood, youth, adulthood, and seniority. Explores innovative ways for people to interact with art pieces.

installations.title: Throw Away
installations.description: An interactive tangible serious game prototype designed to teach children proper waste recycling through playful interaction.
